StoryText: My father texts me and tells me to bring home pasta sauce for him to make dinner.
Question: What do I get for him?

OptionText.Text: The store brand sauce that is cheap
The expensive sauce with the gold label
The medium-priced sauce with the red label
Get him both the expensive sauce and the cheap, store brand sauce

OptionResult.Result: My father gets mad at me for bringing him the cheap stuff but everyone ends up loving the pasta and I’m quite pleased, plus I saved some money.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My father was annoyed that I bought the cheap stuff but I didn’t know which one he wanted and didn’t want to waste so much money. Joke’s on him, it turned out to taste really good!

OptionResult.Result: My father is glad I got the right pasta sauce and we bond as he makes his pasta.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Sure, I may have been out a few extra bucks but I was glad I picked the right sauce and had a good time cooking with my dad.

OptionResult.Result: My father is interested in this one because we’ve never tried it. We have a good time making the pasta but the food ends up tasting awful!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My father and I had a great time cooking and we were both intrigued to try out the new sauce but wow... it was just terrible. Now, we know, red label is out!

OptionResult.Result: My father laughs but appreciates my initiative. He teaches me the difference between the two sauces and teaches me some cooking tips.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I’m glad I gave my father options because I didn’t want to bring the wrong sauce to him. I may have wasted some money but I ended up learning a lot about cooking and had a great time!
